statements: SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_sources;
SELECT source_name, type, capacity FROM renewable_energy_sources WHERE sustainability_score > 80;
SELECT location, type, capacity FROM renewable_energy_sources ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT AVG(capacity) AS average_capacity, MAX(capacity) AS max_capacity, MIN(capacity) AS min_capacity FROM renewable_energy_sources;
SELECT source_name, sustainability_score FROM renewable_energy_sources WHERE type='Solar' OR type='Wind';
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_sources WHERE capacity > 100 ORDER BY source_name ASC
SELECT id, type, capacity FROM renewable_energy_sources WHERE type = 'Solar' ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT source_name, location FROM renewable_energy_sources WHERE sustainability_score > 3
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_sources WHERE type = 'Wind' ORDER BY location
SELECT id, source_name, type, location FROM renewable_energy_sources WHERE capacity > 50 AND sustainability_score IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM SolarPanels WHERE location = 'NYC';
SELECT id, brand, capacity FROM WindTurbines WHERE capacity > 100;
SELECT brand, efficiency FROM SolarPanels ORDER BY efficiency DESC;
SELECT * FROM WindTurbines WHERE location = 'LA' ORDER BY capacity ASC;
SELECT id, location FROM SolarPanels WHERE brand = 'SunPower';
SELECT * FROM SolarPanels WHERE capacity > 250 ORDER BY brand ASC;
SELECT brand, capacity FROM WindTurbines WHERE location = 'California' ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT id, efficiency, location FROM SolarPanels WHERE efficiency < 0.9 ORDER BY id;
SELECT * FROM WindTurbines WHERE rotor_diameter BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY brand, location DESC;
SELECT brand, location FROM SolarPanels WHERE brand LIKE 'Sun%' AND location <> 'New York';
SELECT * FROM solar_panels;
SELECT panel_type, panel_capacity FROM solar_panels WHERE panel_capacity > 100;
SELECT * FROM wind_turbines ORDER BY turbine_capacity DESC;
SELECT turbine_type, turbine_capacity FROM wind_turbines WHERE turbine_capacity < 500;
SELECT panel_type, panel_capacity FROM solar_panels UNION SELECT turbine_type, turbine_capacity FROM wind_turbines;
SELECT panel_id, panel_type, panel_capacity FROM solar_panels WHERE panel_capacity > 100 ORDER BY panel_capacity DESC
SELECT turbine_type, turbine_capacity, turbine_id FROM wind_turbines WHERE turbine_capacity BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY turbine_capacity ASC
SELECT * FROM hydroelectric_plants WHERE plant_type LIKE 'Hydro%' ORDER BY plant_capacity DESC
SELECT panel_type, panel_capacity FROM solar_panels WHERE panel_type = 'Premium' AND panel_capacity >= 200 ORDER BY panel_capacity ASC
SELECT plant_type, plant_capacity FROM hydroelectric_plants WHERE plant_capacity < 500 ORDER BY plant_capacity DESC
SELECT * FROM SolarPanels;
SELECT id, name, capacity FROM WindTurbines;
SELECT location, name, water_flow_rate FROM HydroelectricPlants;
SELECT id, timestamp, value FROM SustainabilityMetrics WHERE metric_name = 'Carbon Emissions';
SELECT id, location, efficiency FROM SolarPanels ORDER BY efficiency DESC;
SELECT * FROM SolarPanels WHERE capacity > 100.0 ORDER BY efficiency DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT name, location, capacity FROM WindTurbines WHERE blade_length < 75.0 ORDER BY height ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, name, location FROM HydroelectricPlants WHERE water_flow_rate > 500.0 ORDER BY capacity DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM SustainabilityMetrics WHERE metric_name = 'carbon_footprint' AND value < 50.0 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM SolarPanels WHERE location = 'California' AND capacity < 200.0 ORDER BY name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM solar_panels ORDER BY brand DESC, efficiency ASC
SELECT id, location FROM wind_turbines WHERE diameter > 100 ORDER BY id LIMIT 5
SELECT brand, efficiency, location FROM solar_panels WHERE efficiency > 0.2
SELECT * FROM sustainability_metrics WHERE metric_name = 'carbon_intensity'
SELECT source_name, location, capacity FROM energy_sources WHERE capacity > 500 ORDER BY capacity DESC
SELECT * FROM solar_panels ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT brand, efficiency FROM wind_turbines WHERE diameter > 100 ORDER BY brand ASC;
SELECT location, capacity FROM hydroelectric_plants WHERE capacity >= 50 AND capacity <= 100 ORDER BY location, capacity ASC;
SELECT source_name, location, capacity FROM energy_sources WHERE source_type = 'Renewable' AND capacity > 200 ORDER BY capacity DESC, location ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, metric_name, metric_value FROM sustainability_metrics WHERE metric_value > 0.8 ORDER BY metric_value DESC, metric_name ASC;
